title: Mobile-Based Medical Simulation Language Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic medical terminology and clinical protocols
context.additional_context: Simulation-based training for language proficiency required in medical settings, with content accessible via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can accurately listen to patient symptom descriptions in a medical simulation environment and document three key pieces of information
Learners can use specialized medical terminology with over 80% accuracy in mock clinical scenarios
Learners can perform verbal communication protocols within five steps in emergency situation simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
